document_data.name: Grindstone
document_data.mainbody:
typical grindstone could be hand-powered, or pedal-powered to ensure easy operation and a steady rate of rotation.

A smaller table-top version called the '''grinding wheel''' was used by jewelers to polish and finish [[gem]]s and delicate pieces of metalwork.
